Mount_Vernon.Davids' Island (New York): Davids' Island is a 78-acre (320,000 m2) island off the coast of New Rochelle, New York, in Long Island Sound. Currently uninhabited, in the past it was the site of Fort Slocum. The island is home to the endangered Kemp's Ridley sea turtle, and rare birds such as osprey and least terns.
